mapper.update: UPDATE board SET readNum = readNum + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx};
mapper.select: SELECT idx,title FROM board WHERE idx IN ( (SELECT idx FROM board WHERE idx < #{idx} order by idx desc limit 1), (SELECT idx FROM board WHERE idx > #{idx} order by idx limit 1));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardReply VALUES (default, #{rVo.boardIdx}, #{rVo.mid}, #{rVo.nickName}, default, #{rVo.hostIp}, #{rVo.content}, default, #{rVo.levelOrder});
